title: Disgusting and highly offensive towards female players.
body:
So im typing this form because i am extremely unhappy with how the banning system is currently, Look at how people play and ban people because of Intentionally feeding and because of how negative attitude or grieving is in the game but not once have i seen anyone get a ban for feeding or making the game shit or the environment unhealthy for players in the league of legends community. I have had 1 of my accounts banned in the last week because of me being toxic and for "verbal abuse and harassment" yet in those 2 games i had to stand up for myself because my whole team was flaming me in the last game because i was a female and apparently i am &quote, "a disgusting fat pig, with no life"(which isn't true, i am a petite girl) nobody cares why I was flaming them but what really really bothers me is that they probably didn't get suspended or muted.
starting to find this game disgusting and highly offensive towards female players in the chat, and nothing is being done about it. i am constantly getting bans and chat restrictions for standing up for myself while guys are discriminating and being highly inappropriate against females in the chat.
 i swear or curse once and riot goes nope get permanently  banned. It is so fucking unfair on how this happens and that i swear once in game and riot has to instantly ban me but people feed and i try carry them and i pay the price because im toxic to the environment. Riot explain to me why this game is cancer?
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: If people are sexist in real life, what would you do? Ignore them and get on with life. Hit the mute button and report them after the game. Problem solved.

My mother didnt raise a little Russian bitch and i will stand up for myself when things are not right and for what i believe in.
 
i like to leave my chat open and running during match to communicate with my team, and i make good jokes in match.

Post chat log? Because no 1 get PERMA BANNED just on the 1st offence.  

Also, no 1 would know you are a female, or care; Unless you flaunting it as an arguement point. I can make many assumstions, but yea, post chat log if you think you are being unfairly banned.

again, incapable of reading. the person said 2 games suggesting that they had already been 14 day suspended recently. and it is indeed possible to get perma banned in 2 games. fact.

also people tend to use the word "banned" when they receive a 14 day suspension. so when this person says " i got instantly banned for swearing" they are probably referring to both the suspension and the actual ban.

Ah, thank you for correcting me. I jumped to conclusion.

Regardless of what she claimed. It best if she post the chat log, the things that was said in there might justify the banned; needless to say if it was the 1st time or many times.

Honestly you dont even need to say that you are, i swear they can sniff it out
pack of animals!

>because my whole team was flaming me in the last game because i was a female

Maybe don't declare your a female to everyone, tends to help.

Being female should not automatically make you are target!

I apologise for all the immature brothers.
It's not that females are a target, it's that anyone that puts up a target tends to get targeted.

I mean there are those that will use it against you for sure. I've been told some pretty vulgar things just because I was suspected to be female (support Nami main, comes with the territory) but I'm certain those kind of people are just desperate assholes who'd uhhh..."target" anything that would give them so much as the time of day.

As you say, anything that stands out is a target, if you give them one you can't be surprised when that's the one they aim at.

Honestly you dont even need to say that you are, i swear they can sniff it out 
pack of animals!

Especially when they make offensive comments in the chat, that triggers you.
Maybe don't go on the internet then.
lol just mute all and if they r toxic dont be toxic back and dont say your a female if you dont want to be sworn at and report them after

How do people know you are a girl? If you flaunt or mention your sex when it holds no relevance to a video game then you deserve hate for being an ethot. If they just happen to be somehow guessing you are one (which I doubt unless you answered that you were to them asking) then just mute and move along.

This is the internet sweetie, women are a punching bag here. I don't personally support that (unless they are attention seeking) but you should know that.

Also welcome to the auto-detect no meanie chat checker. Its like a high school no tolerance policy if som1 tells you to go eat it and die and you respond that they are a [any words in the detection filter] ya gunna get banned regardless of context.

btw girl here ahaha hehe xd <3 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

You are petite with no life?

Turns out that 14day suspensions are being given out as a Christmas reward this year. 

Mute all, unbind chat from enter. Its the only way to be sure.
